alert.note: Alert for Eastern Juab, Millard Counties (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 08 at 12:29AM MST until January 08 at 5:00AM MST by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 AM MST EARLY THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Snow. Additional snow accumulations of up to one inch. * WHERE...Eastern Juab/Millard Counties. * WHEN...Until 5 AM MST early this morning. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible especially over mountain passes along Interstate 15. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. For graphical depictions of the snowfall forecast, including Official NWS Forecast, High End Amount, and Low End Amount, visit weather.gov/slc/winter. For winter road conditions from the Utah Department of Transportation, visit http://www.udottraffic.utah.gov.
